name.retail: What is the name of the shop / supermarket that you would like to add?

new.selectCoordinates: Where is the location? Mark the exact spot by hand and/or with the search function.

edit.name: Name of the location
edit.selectCoordinates: Click in the map below to select the new location

placeholder.description: Short description of this location, e.g. opening hours or ambience.

products.title: Vegan Products
products.description: This location offers these vegan products:

noProducts.anonymousPart1: No products have been entered yet. If you
noProducts.anonymousPart2: you can enter vegan products available here.
noProducts.user: No products have been entered yet. You can enter vegan products by completing one of the missions below.

quality.explanation: The more twigs the bigger and better the vegan offer here.
quality.noRatingExplanation: The quality of the vegan offer has not been evaluated yet. Be the first to rate it!

effort.explanation: The fairer the whether the greater the interest of the staff to fulfill vegan wishes.

locationTags.explanation: The tags show which vegan offers were liked by how many people here.
locationTags.noTags: No one has indicated which vegan offers they like here. Be the first to do so!

location.approximateAddress: This address was looked up automatically and is therefore approximate.

marker.title: Zoom in to show these {{numLocations}} locations.

title.gastronomy: Vegan menu: food options found at gastronomy locations in this map section
title.retail: Vegan products found at retail locations in this map section

visitBonus.title: Visit this location.
visitBonus.explanation: For your first visit at a location within a few weeks you get points.
visitBonus.description: Only complete this mission if you are currently visiting this location.

hasOptions.title: Ask the staff for vegan options.
hasOptions.description: According to the staff, are there any vegan options available here?
hasOptions.description2: What do you think: are there any vegan options available here?
hasOptions.explanation: Explicitly ask for something vegan, or ask whether something is vegan, using the word "vegan". By doing so you can make sure that the staff realises: "Our customers are interested in vegan options, there's a demand." This improves the chances that they'll supply more and better vegan options in future.

outcome.yes: You said that according to the staff there are vegan options here.
outcome.no: You said that according to the staff there are no vegan options here.
outcome.ratherYes: The staff doesn't know but you think that they probably have vegan options here.
outcome.noClue: The staff doesn't know and you also have no idea whether they have any vegan options here.
outcome.ratherNo: The staff doesn't know but you think that they probably don't have any vegan options here.

wantVegan.title: Talk to the staff about vegan options.
wantVegan.description: What expressions did you or the staff use while talking about vegan options?
wantVegan.explanation: Sometimes the staff doesn't know what "vegan" means, or you are unsure whether they know. Sometimes they seem to confuse it with something else, or they forget that e.g. butter isn't vegan. At other times, the staff explains how their vegan options are produced, or what they contain.

outcome.description: You talked to the staff about vegan options and the following expressions were used:

particularOption.title: Ask for a specific vegan product.
particularOption.description: Which specific vegan product did you ask for?
particularOption.explanation: Ask the staff for one or several specific vegan products that you are interested in. If they don't sell them yet they might do so in the future, given enough people ask for them.

form.placeholder: Enter the product which you asked for

outcome.description: You asked for these vegan products:

whatOptions.title: Find out what vegan products are available here.
whatOptions.description: What vegan products are available here?
whatOptions.description2: You don't have to re-enter the following products:
whatOptions.explanation: The goal is to make the list of vegan products as complete and as up-to-date as possible. Add vegan products that aren't on the list yet, confirm vegan products that are already listed and indicate which vegan products on the list are not available (at the moment).

buyOptions.title: Buy something vegan.
buyOptions.explanation: Do you fancy one or the other vegan product available here? If so, you can show the staff that it pays off to supply vegan products by buying them. And while you're paying, why not mention that you chose this product (in part) because it's vegan? The more the staff hears the word "vegan" in a positive context, the better.

giveFeedback.title: Mission: Impossible.
giveFeedback.description: What kind of impossible mission did you attempt here?
giveFeedback.explanation: Sometimes it's the most improbable things that work the best. Maybe they'll put a vegan version of your favourite dish on the menu if you ask really nicely, or they switch their whole offer to vegan options if you tell them about all the vegan things there are.

outcome.description: You tried this mission impossible here:

offerQuality.title: Evaluate the offer at this location from a veganautic standpoint.
offerQuality.description: How well does this location satisfy veganautic needs?
offerQuality.explanation: Veganauts want to be able to choose from a lot of high-quality vegan options. At some places there are no or hardly any vegan options, or the vegan options aren't convincing yet. At other places there already are a few vegan options, some of which are satisfying. Yet other places have a quite remarkable range of vegan options, many of which are great. Finally, there are places where there are tons of vegan options and they are all fantastic.

effortValue.title: Indicate whether the staff here is interested in "vegan".
effortValue.description: How open is the staff at this location towards vegan wishes? How likely is the vegan offer to grow and prosper here?
effortValue.explanation: At some locations the staff has zero interest in anything "vegan" (bad weather), at other places they are more open and make a sincere effort to satisfy vegan wishes (good weather).

outcome.yes: The staff here shows a lot of interest in "vegan".
outcome.ratherYes: The staff here shows some interest in "vegan".
outcome.ratherNo: The staff here shows little interest in "vegan".
outcome.no: The staff here shows no interest in "vegan" whatsoever.

locationTags.title: Your preferences
locationTags.description: Which vegan offers of this location do you like?

rateProduct.title: Your rating
rateProduct.description: How do you rate this offer?

rating.noRating: This product hasn't been rated yet.

availability.temporarilyUnavailable: This product is currently not available.
availability.unavailable: This product is no longer available or was entered by mistake.

title.main: Search for restaurants, shops and geographical places

locationList.descriptionWholeWorld: Showing locations with vegan offers in the whole world.
locationList.noResults: No locations can be found in the given area.

open.text1: All our infos about vegan offers were contributed by people like you and can be used freely for your own projects: Veganaut is

participate.text: Do you want to help others to explore the vegan universe? Veganaut lets you share and rate vegan discoveries.

missingFeature.showMoreSearchResults: Sorry, showing more results doesn't work yet. We're still programming this feature. Thanks for letting us know your interest!
